com.ems.dao

Class EventDao

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ems.dao.EventDao

  • public class EventDao
extends java.lang.Object
    EventDao is the class that performs actions on the Event of the database Code inspired by http://danielniko.wordpress.com/2012/04/17/simple-crud-using-jsp-servlet-and-mysql/
    Author:
    Luca Barazzuol
